recipe.title: Aviation
ingredients: homemade maraschino cherry (see note, below) or pitted fresh cherry
instructions: In cocktail shaker, combine lemon juice, gin, maraschino liqueur, and simple syrup. Add ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Strain into chilled coupe glass and drop in cherry.
